page.title: 09Leisure
page.content: {Where Families Holidayed And What {Accomodation They Used In our area,most families holidayed in the United Kingdom.The rest holidayed in Europe,apart from one who went to America.26% of families went self catering-ie:villas and cottages.44% of families went camping or caravanning. Only 14% stayed in hotels. {What Men Do In Their Spare Time} Watching games is the favourite pastime.The two least favourite are dancing and playing music.One dad does nothing as he has no spare time. {What Women Do In Their Spare Time Most women enjoy eating out,playing music and listening to records.Reading is also popular along with watching television.A significant number enjoy walking and keeping fit.Very belong to clubs or organisations,or take part in competitive sport.
